description: Spearheaded the development of a sophisticated e-commerce platform catering to BigMart's needs, utilizing React.js framework.
Collaborated closely with the design team to craft responsive and visually appealing user interfaces, ensuring seamless user experiences across devices.

Implemented robust state management solutions with Redux, optimized performance through efficient code practices, and provided mentorship to junior developers, fostering a culture of continual improvement.
Led a team of designers in creating intuitive and innovative user interface designs for various digital platforms, with a focus on maximizing usability and enhancing user satisfaction.
Worked in partnership with front-end developers to ensure the technical feasibility of designs and maintained a cohesive aesthetic across all product interfaces.

Conducted user testing and feedback sessions to refine designs, ensuring all user interfaces are accessible and user-friendly, and provided leadership in adopting new design technologies and methodologies.
Designed and implemented scalable server architectures to support high-traffic e-commerce applications, using Node.js and MongoDB.
Ensured robust API integration and security protocols were in place to protect data and system integrity while facilitating seamless interactions between front-end and back-end components.
Provided strategic direction and technical leadership within the engineering team, overseeing the migration of legacy systems to modern cloud-based infrastructure.
Directed the product lifecycle of an advanced e-commerce platform, from concept through delivery, aligning product features with strategic business goals.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams, including marketing, sales, and engineering, to develop features that meet market demands and enhance customer satisfaction.

Utilized data analytics to monitor product performance and user engagement, adjusting strategies in real time to optimize market reach and profitability, while mentoring junior product managers in best practices.
